items.question: Is modular or panelized construction more expensive than traditional building?
items.answer: Not necessarily. Faster timelines and efficient processes often lower overall costs with complete transparency from the start.

items.question: Will my home look like a “prefab box”?
items.answer: No - every project is fully customizable in layout and finishes.

items.question: How long does it take to build?
items.answer: Typically 3-5 months from permit approval to completion.

items.question: Do you handle permits and approvals?
items.answer: Yes - our team manages the entire process.

items.question: Is modular/panelized construction durable?
items.answer: Absolutely - built with light-gauge steel and high-performance materials for strength and longevity.

testimonials.author: Daniel Cooper
testimonials.quote: Fastruct made the entire building process incredibly smooth. The modular installation was fast, clean, and exactly on schedule. The final result feels solid, modern, and far higher quality than traditional builds I've seen.

testimonials.author: Victoria Lane
testimonials.quote: The precision is unbelievable. Every detail of our home feels intentional and well-crafted. Communication was consistent and clear throughout the project. Truly a premium building experience.

testimonials.author: Michael Adams
testimonials.quote: Our project was completed months earlier than expected. The factory-built components made the timeline reliable and stress-free. The team was professional, and the result exceeded every expectation we had.

testimonials.author: Sarah Mitchell
testimonials.quote: Finally, a modern way to build. Fastruct guided us through a simple, organized process and delivered a home that looks amazing and feels incredibly sturdy. The entire experience was efficient and surprisingly enjoyable.
